about.subTitle: Know About Us
about.title: Our Mission And Vision
about.description: Motas is an innovative platform designed to connect customers with local automobile repair shops. Our core mission is to make finding reliable repair services easy with user-friendly platform and efficient appointment scheduling system, enhancing the customer experience and supporting local repair shops in growing their businesses.

features.title: User-friendly Platform
features.text: Our platform is designed with ease of use in mind, providing a seamless experience for users to find and connect with local automobile repair shops.

features.title: Easy Appointment Scheduling
features.text: Effortlessly schedule appointments with your preferred repair shops using our intuitive booking system, tailored to fit your busy schedule.

faqArea.subTitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faqArea.title: Questions About Our Car Repair Shop Platform
faqArea.description: Learn more about our platform for car repair shops and how we can help you grow your business and connect with customers.

faq1.question: How can my car repair shop benefit from joining your platform?
faq1.answer: By joining our platform, your car repair shop gains visibility, access to a broader customer base, and tools to manage services, prices, and customer feedback efficiently.

faq2.question: What information do I need to provide to list my shop on your platform?
faq2.answer: To list your shop, we require basic information such as your shop's name, location, services offered, pricing details, and any customer testimonials or reviews you'd like to showcase.

faq3.question: Is there a cost to join your platform as a car repair shop?
faq3.answer: We offer flexible subscription plans tailored to suit different needs. Contact us to discuss pricing options and find a plan that works best for your shop.

faq4.question: How can customers find my shop through your platform?
faq4.answer: Customers can easily search for your shop based on location, services offered, customer ratings, and other criteria. We optimize search visibility to ensure your shop gets noticed by potential customers.

faqArea2.subTitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faqArea2.title: Questions About Our Car Repair Shop Platform

faq1.question: What is Motas?
faq1.answer: Motas is a platform that connects customers with local car repair shops, providing easy access to reliable repair services and efficient appointment scheduling.

faq2.question: How can I register my car repair shop on Motas?
faq2.answer: To register your car repair shop, contact us by form, phone or email. We will contact you back immediately.

faq3.question: Is there a fee to use Motas?
faq3.answer: Yes, there is a subscription fee to list your car repair shop on Motas. After you contacting us, we will provide you the best deal to help to improve your business.

faq4.question: How can customers book appointments through Motas?
faq4.answer: Customers can book appointments by visiting your repair shop's page on Motas and selecting an available time slot.

faq5.question: Can customers leave reviews on my repair shop page?
faq5.answer: Yes, customers can leave reviews and ratings on your repair shop's page, helping others make informed decisions.
